predicates.name: AUTHOR
predicates.description: Represents authorship relationship between an entity and a work

predicates.name: LOCATION
predicates.description: Indicates the location where something is situated

predicates.name: TYPE
predicates.description: Describes the type or category of an entity

predicates.name: PARENTAGE
predicates.description: Represents a parent-child relationship between two people

predicates.name: MARRIAGE
predicates.description: Indicates the marital status between two people

predicates.name: PARTICIPATION
predicates.description: Represents an entity's participation in a work or project
